backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for a finance education platform, including user profile management, quiz results, password hashing, portfolio tracking, predictions, news articles, market alerts, leaderboard, and AI advisor chat with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one- to two-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, key components, and notable fixes or additions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.) used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to the platform name and mounting the app via the `/src/main.tsx` module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (home, learn, playground, news, portfolio, advisor, community, profile, API reference), handles authentication state, shows a profile setup modal for new users, and wraps pages in a shared layout with TopNav and footer.
frontend/src/components/BiometricAuthBut: WebAuthn-based biometric authentication component supporting credential registration and authentication, storing credential IDs in localStorage keyed by principal, with status feedback and explicit ArrayBuffer allocation for WebAuthn API compatibility.
frontend/src/components/ChatInput.tsx: Auto-resizing textarea chat input component that sends messages on Enter or button click, with loading and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Renders a single chat message bubble with user or bot avatar, styled differently for each sender, and displays a formatted timestamp.
A modal dialog component for creating community forum posts, supporting up to 500-character content and up to 5 optional stock symbol tags.
frontend/src/components/ForumPostCard.ts: Displays a single forum post card with author info, timestamp, content, stock symbol badges, and an upvote button with vote count.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: A reusable styled card wrapper component with glassmorphism styling, optional hover effects, and teal/gold glow variants.
frontend/src/components/HoldingForm.tsx: A modal form for adding or editing a portfolio holding, allowing the user to select a stock symbol, enter share count, and average buy price.
frontend/src/components/LivePriceChart.t: A real-time line chart component that polls live price data at 3-second intervals and plots up to 60 ticks, coloring the line teal or red relative to the session open price.
Displays a live-updating price ticker for a given stock symbol with flash animation, showing current price, absolute change, and percentage change with directional color coding.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: An authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing a user avatar and display name when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/MarketAlertBanne: Renders a list of market alert banners with severity-based styling (critical/high/medium) including icons, animated pulse dots, relative timestamps, and dismiss functionality.
Displays a collapsible news article card showing sentiment badge, market impact icon, score, date, summary, and related stock symbols.
frontend/src/components/PasswordSetupMod: A dialog modal for setting or updating a user password, with SHA-256 hashing, strength indicator, validation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioAllocat: Renders a donut pie chart showing portfolio allocation by holding value using Recharts, with a custom tooltip displaying value and percentage.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioPerform: Renders a bar chart showing per-holding gain/loss percentage using Recharts, with green/red color coding and a zero reference line.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioRiskHea: Renders a scatter chart plotting holdings by portfolio weight vs. simulated volatility, with bubble size representing position value.
frontend/src/components/PredictionCard.t: Displays a stock prediction card comparing the user's prediction, AI prediction, and actual outcome with directional badges and a correct/incorrect indicator.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter a display name and saves their profile using the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation hook. It prevents dismissal until the form is submitted.
frontend/src/components/SentimentImpactC: A composed Recharts chart that visualizes sentiment scores and simulated market prices over time from a list of news articles. It renders an area series for sentiment and a line series for price with a custom tooltip.
A Recharts line chart that displays historical closing prices for a given stock symbol, coloring the line green or red based on whether the price trended up or down. Includes a reference line at the opening price and a custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: The sticky top navigation bar with links to all major app sections, a login button, a profile link, and a bell icon that shows a badge count of high/critical market alerts. Supports both desktop and mobile (hamburger) layouts.
A modal form that allows admins to submit a new financial news article with title, summary, ticker symbols, and market impact score, then calls the `useAddNewsArticle` mutation and shows a success or error state.
frontend/src/data/learningTopics.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and a static array of structured learning topics (e.g., Stock Market Basics) each containing markdown educational content and multiple-choice quiz questions with explanations.
frontend/src/data/mockStocks.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for OHLC stock data and mock stocks, and exports a list of mock stocks (AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, etc.) with randomly generated 30-day price histories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLivePrice.ts: Custom hook that simulates a live-updating stock price for a given symbol by polling getLivePrice on a configurable interval and tracking previous price and session open for change calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, covering user profiles, passwords, learning progress, predictions, portfolios, conversations, posts, news, and alerts via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a dark finance-themed design system with OKLCH CSS custom properties for colors, glass-morphism utilities, and component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdvisorChatPage.tsx: A chat page component that provides a rule-based AI financial advisor, generating contextual responses about portfolios, predictions, news sentiment, and diversification using data fetched from backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdvisorPage.tsx: An alternative AI advisor page with a more detailed chat UI, building system context from live portfolio P&L, recent news, and prediction history to generate structured financial advice responses.
frontend/src/pages/ApiReferencePage.tsx: An interactive API reference page that documents and allows live testing of four public backend endpoints (news feed, market alerts, stock list, leaderboard), displaying formatted JSON responses.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityForumPage.ts: A community forum page where authenticated users can create posts with stock symbols and upvote others, with sorting by latest or top-voted using backend query/mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The landing page featuring a hero section, a grid of six platform module links, and a features section highlighting AI insights, decentralized security, and visualizations, with Internet Identity login support.
frontend/src/pages/LearningModulePage.ts: Displays a grid of finance learning topics with overall progress tracking, showing completed/remaining counts and linking each topic to its detail page.
frontend/src/pages/NewsModulePage.tsx: Renders a financial news dashboard with sentiment analysis charts, market alert banners, article filtering, and visualizations using Recharts; supports news upload and ICP identity integration.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioAnalyzerPage: Provides a portfolio management UI where users can add/remove stock holdings, view live prices, and analyze allocation, risk, sector breakdown, and simulated performance via multiple chart types.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows a user profile page aggregating learning progress, prediction accuracy, and portfolio performance, with options for password setup and biometric authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StockPlaygroundPage.t: Implements a stock prediction arena where users select a stock, submit directional predictions, compare results against AI forecasts, and review prediction history with accuracy stats.
frontend/src/pages/TopicLessonPage.tsx: Displays a single learning topic's lesson content with markdown-like rendering, showing completion status, navigation to previous/next topics, and a link to the topic's quiz.
frontend/src/pages/TopicQuizPage.tsx: Renders an interactive multiple-choice quiz for a given learning topic, tracks answers, saves progress to the backend on completion, and displays a scored results screen.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend design system.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state including version, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues for an AI-powered finance education and investment intelligence platform.
